text: Tommy Trouble and the Magic Marble is a children's novel written by Ralph Fletcher with drawings by Ben Caldwell. It was first published in 2000. ==Plot summary== Tommy who loves collecting needs ten dollars to buy a magic marble from another boy. He tries to pick flowers from his mother's rose garden to sell to a neighbor. He also tries to trade his little brothers snake. Tommy finally decides that the magic marble is not worth the trouble. ==References== * * * ==Other websites== *Ralph Fletcher's website Category:2000 books Category:Books by Ralph Fletcher Category:20th-century American novels Category:American children's books
